title.narrative: OUTPUT 013:SCALE-UP OF Prevention of Mother to Child Transmission of HIV (PMTCT) SERVICE

description.narrative: OUTPUT 013 - Scale-up of Prevention of Mother to Child Transmission of HIV (PMTCT) services: Health system in the highest HIV prevalence region has capacity to provide integrated PMTCT services., which contributes to Care And Treatment Of Children Affected By Hiv And Aids, Hiv Prevention, Hiv â€“ General, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: OUTCOME 004 - Maternal, neonatal and child health: Women and children have improved and equitable access to and utilize quality, high impact maternal, neonatal and child health interventions with a special focus on the 5 most deprived regions.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: OUTPUT 013 - Scale-up of PMTCT services: Health system in the highest HIV prevalence region has capacity to provide integratedPMTCT services.

description.narrative: The First Lady launched the Paediatric HIV Services Acceleration Plan to increase access to Antiretroviral Therapy for children, PMTCT has now been integrated into MNCH services for better quality of care for children and innovative mobile technology for PMTCT/EID services implemented in HIV high burden region to reduce lost-to-follow-up | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:29/12/2017

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Adoption of the 2015 WHO HIV treatment guidelines (which recommend that ART to be initiated in everyone living with HIV including children)

actual.value: 2016:Adoption completed as part of launch 90, 90, 90 treat all and implementation initiated

title.narrative: Pediatric HIV Acceleration Plan is developed and roll out initiated
Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for integration of PMTCT into MNCH services is available

actual.value: 2017:Standard Operating Procedure is available, endorsed and being implemented

title.narrative: Innovative mobile technology designed for implementation in highest burden district Eastern Region

National HIV Strategic plan/guidance for care and treatment that are aligned to Global targets and the most recent WHO recommendations for care and treatment of children , adolescents and pregnant/breast feeding women
